entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
